entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING, Banff
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:38 a.m. MDT Monday 10 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 2.4Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Banff 1:00 PM MDT Monday 10 April 2023
Temperature: 2.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.4 kPa falling
Humidity: 94 %
Dewpoint: 1.6°C
Wind: SSW 5 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: n/a

entry.title: Monday: Periods of rain. High 9.
entry.summary: Periods of rain. Snow level 2100 metres rising to 2400 metres this afternoon. High 9. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Monday 10 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of rain or snow. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of rain changing to snow after midnight. Snow near Lake Louise late this evening and after midnight. Snow level 2400 metres lowering to valley bottom after midnight. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Monday 10 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Rain or snow. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Snow changing to rain in the morning. Snow near Lake Louise late in the morning and in the afternoon. Snow level rising to 2200 metres near noon. Snowfall amount 10 cm near Lake Louise. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High plus 5. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Monday 10 April 2023
